paragraph__1.content: Read [our guide](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/88-setup-color-settings) for help setting up your color palette.

mobile_bar.label: Mobile bar
mobile_bar.info: This setting controls the top bar on mobile devices. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/83-sitewide-using-a-mobile-bar-color).

border_dark.label: Border
border_dark.info: Different shades of borders will be generated from your selection.

color_enable_switch.label: Enable theme toggle
color_enable_switch.info: Let customers switch between light and dark mode.

paragraph__1.content: Read [our guide](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/87-setup-border-settings) for help selecting your border settings.
Read [our guide](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/86-setup-typography-settings) for help selecting your typography settings, as well as suggested font pairings.

type_base_size.label: Base size
type_base_size.info: Page elements scale using the base font size.

type_seperator.label: Text separator
type_seperator.info: Used to seperate text elements, such as 'Add to cart | $9.00'.

layout_alignment.label: Horizontal alignment
layout_alignment.info: The default alignment for page content.

enable_audio.label: Enable audio interface sounds
enable_audio.info: Audio is applied to interactions to reinforce specific functionality. Note: only works on desktop.

enable_animations.label: Enable animations
enable_animations.info: Subtle animations to the improve user experience.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px. 400 x 400px recommended.

paragraph__1.content: Favicon may also be shown in search results and rich snippets. [Learn more](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/structured-data/logo).

product_card_stock_threshold.label: Stock threshold
product_card_stock_threshold.info: Remaining stock count of a product will be displayed if it falls below this number. Leave this blank to hide the stock count.

product_card_enable_tagline.label: Enable product tagline
product_card_enable_tagline.info: Show a short description for a product. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/79-sitewide-adding-taglines-to-product-thumbnails).

unavailable_indication.label: Unavailable indication
unavailable_indication.info: Control how unavailable options are indicated.

options__2.label: When option is not available in any variant

options__3.label: When option is not available with selections

show_collection_url.label: Enable collection aware product URLs
show_collection_url.info: Product page URLs will include the collection handle they were linked from.

enable_default_selling_plan_widget.label: Enable default selling plan widget
enable_default_selling_plan_widget.info: Enable this if you want to show the built-in selling plan widget.

price_enable_zeros.label: Show trailing zeros
price_enable_zeros.info: Uncheck this to hide '.00' in prices.

price_enable_currency.label: Show currency symbol
price_enable_currency.info: Uncheck this to hide the currency code in prices.

cart_icon_behavior.label: Cart button behavior
cart_icon_behavior.info: Control the behavior of the cart button in the header.

cart_shipping_bar_total.label: Progress bar calculation
cart_shipping_bar_total.info: Choose to calculate the progress bar based on subtotal or total.

cart_behavior.label: Desktop cart behavior
cart_behavior.info: Control the site behavior when items are added to a customers cart.

enable_language.label: Enable language selector
enable_language.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages).

enable_region.label: Enable country/region selector
enable_region.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings](/admin/settings/payments).

paragraph__1.content: Set which fields are queired with quick-search. Note: Using all fields can be slow.

paragraph__2.content: Control what results are shown when searching.

enable_local_business.label: Enable local business
enable_local_business.info: Display your website in local search results. Great for businesses with one physical store. To change your store address, visit [general settings](/admin/settings/general). [Learn more](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/structured-data/local-business#examples).

paragraph__1.content: To update your local business address, go to your [general settings](/admin/settings/general).

maps_api_key.label: Google Maps API key
maps_api_key.info: You'll need to register a Google Maps API Key to display any map. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/148-creating-a-google-maps-api-key).

paragraph__1.content: Row size sets the maxium number of items that can be displayed in a single row.

layout_row_span.label: Row span
layout_row_span.info: Extend the height of a block by forcing it to take up multiple rows.

layout_col_span.label: Column span
layout_col_span.info: Extend the width of a block by forcing it to take up multiple columns.

enable_image.label: Show featured image
enable_image.info: Featured blog post image will be used as a background.

url.label: URL
url.info: Include a URL if you want the entire banner to be clickable. If a button is included using a block itâ€™s URL will be ignored.

enable_image.label: Show featured image
enable_image.info: Featured collection image will be used as a background.

paragraph__1.content: Blocks can be used to show additional promotional content within a collection grid. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/181-core-templates-collection).

column_size.label: Column span
column_size.info: Extend the width of a block by forcing it to take up multiple columns.

column_size.label: Column span
column_size.info: Extend the width of a block by forcing it to take up multiple columns.

countdown_date.label: Countdown date-time
countdown_date.info: Enter a date in the following format: mm/dd/yyyy.

layout_x_alignment.info: Using a Center or Right alignment will force icons to stack vertically.

enable_default_variant.label: Enable default variant
enable_default_variant.info: First variant will be selected by default.

enable_zoom.label: Enable zoom
enable_zoom.info: Clicking an image will show a full-screen view.

enable_alt.label: Show alt text
enable_alt.info: Alt text will be displayed under each image.

enable_multiple_variant_images.label: Only show media associated with the selected variant
enable_multiple_variant_images.info: Other variants' media will be hidden. Additional setup is required. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/182-core-templates-product).

enable_ratio.label: Use set aspect ratio
enable_ratio.info: Gallery images will be resized to set aspect ratio.

paragraph__1.content: Use metafields to assign products to this bundle. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/63-extra-templates-product-bundle)
Link multiple products together and display them as options. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/182-core-templates-product)

Collect more product information with custom fields. E.g. include a custom engraving field to let customers customize their purchase. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/182-core-templates-product).

Display a link that opens a slide-out drawer. Use it to conveniently showcase product details such as sizing charts. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/182-core-templates-product).

option.label: Option
option.info: Optionally specify which variant option to display this block next to. Lowercase required.

threshold.label: Inventory threshold
threshold.info: Inventory count will be displayed if stock falls below this number.

enable_dynamic_checkout.label: Enable dynamic checkout
enable_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout).

enable_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
enable_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

intent.label: Intent
intent.info: Note: Complementary results need to be set up using the Search and discovery [app](/admin/apps/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations). Related products are automatically generated.

image.label: Image
image.info: When disabling the dynamic map, this image serves as a static backup. 2496 x 1000px recommended.

paragraph__1.content: If the map is enabled, you need to define a custom pin for this address.[Learn how to get coordinates](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/18539?hl=en).

announcement_delay.label: Automatic announcement delay
announcement_delay.info: Set this to 0 to disable automatic scrolling.

paragraph__1.content: Note: The Progress Bar only works with the default store currency. If you have a multi-currency store, we recommend disabling this feature. Visit our help center for alternative solutions.

progress_bar_threshold.label: Minimum amount
progress_bar_threshold.info: Enter the value without a currency symbol and use a decimal to separate dollars and cents. E.g. 10.00

progress_bar_success.label: Success message
progress_bar_success.info: This message will be shown when the minimum threshold is reached.

main_enable_cart_subtotals.label: Show cart subtotals
main_enable_cart_subtotals.info: By default cart subtotals are only shown when the cart has an active discount. Enable this setting to always show the cart summary.

main_cart_upgrade_product.label: Variant ID
main_cart_upgrade_product.info: The upsell checkbox can only be used with single variants.

cart_button_behavior.label: Action button
cart_button_behavior.info: Main action button in your cart drawer.

paragraph__1.content: Blocks can be used to include additional promotional content within the cart drawer on desktop. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/115-core-sections-cart-drawer).

paragraph__2.content: Note: Cart blocks are only visible on desktop.

search_links.label: Search recommendations
search_links.info: Show recommended links as customers search.

show_search_icon_mobile.label: Show search as icon on mobile

enable_click_dropdown.label: Enable click-to-open dropdown
enable_click_dropdown.info: The dropdown menu will only open after clicking.

paragraph__1.content: Blocks can be used to show featured content within the desktop dropdown navigation. [Learn more](https://help.brickspacelab.com/en/articles/117-core-sections-header).

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: Specify which menu you want this block to be displayed under. Lowercase required.

paragraph__1.content: Note: The back to top bottom may overlap with fixed elements. Consider disabling the sticky add to cart bar to avoid this.

auto_play.label: Auto-play video
auto_play.info: Video will be muted. Customers will click 'Play' to see the full video with sound.
